title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
at Waukeen's rest, The Risen Road. You'll find Counsellor Florrick in one of the rooms upstairs. This will update the journal for: Rescue the Grand Duke.

Act 1 Walkthrough

Speak with Counsellor Florrick.

Exit the burning building and a cutscene will the counsellor will soon begin. She thanks you for freeing her and tells you that the Grand Duke Ravengard, has been taken prisoner by the drows. She requests your help to rescue the Grand Duke. Agree to help to continue onwards. If you refuse, it
